mapper.insert: insert into product values (null, #{storeId}, #{brandId}, #{productName}, #{productNum}, #{productInvent}, #{typeId}, #{supplyId}, #{placeId}, #{unitId}, #{introduce}, 0, #{inPrice}, #{salePrice}, #{memPrice}, now(), null, #{createBy}, null, #{imgs}, #{productDate}, #{suppDate})
mapper.update: update product set store_id = #{storeId}, brand_id = #{brandId}, product_name = #{productName}, product_num = #{productNum}, product_invent = #{productInvent}, type_id = #{typeId}, supply_id = #{supplyId}, place_id = #{placeId}, unit_id = #{unitId}, introduce = #{introduce}, in_price = #{inPrice}, sale_price = #{salePrice}, mem_price = #{memPrice}, update_time = now(), update_by = #{updateBy}, imgs = #{imgs}, product_date = #{productDate}, supp_date = #{suppDate} where product_id = #{productId}
update product set product_invent = product_invent + #{invent} where product_id = #{productId}
mapper.select:
select count(*) from product t1, store t2, brand t3, product_type t4, supply t5, place t6, unit t7 where t1.store_id = t2.store_id and t1.brand_id = t3.brand_id and t1.type_id = t4.type_id and t1.supply_id = t5.supply_id and t1.place_id = t6.place_id and t1.unit_id = t7.unit_id
and t1.store_id = #{storeId}
and t1.product_name like concat('%',#{productName},'%')
and t3.brand_name like concat('%', #{brandName}, '%')
and t4.type_name like concat('%', #{typeName}, '%')
and t5.supply_name like concat('%', #{supplyName}, '%')
and t6.place_name like concat('%', #{placeName}, '%')
and t1.up_down_state = #{upDownState}
and date_format(now(), '%y-%m-%d') > t1.supp_date
and date_format(now(), '%y-%m-%d') < t1.supp_date

and t1.store_id = #{product.storeId}

and t3.brand_name like concat('%', #{product.brandName}, '%')

and t5.supply_name like concat('%', #{product.supplyName}, '%')
and t6.place_name like concat('%', #{product.placeName}, '%')

and date_format(now(), '%y-%m-%d') < t1.supp_date
